name: Real Me
description:
Real Me - AI plugin for Magnify

For Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1

This is a stupid game where an AI takes your place in a conference call.
Say the right things at the right time to convince your co-workers that the AI is the real you.
Don't forget to blink.

Known issues:

  • The game... just in general.
  • "Alalyzer"? I swear it had an n all this time.
